title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Soft gentle n fragrant while using this.Satisfies senses hence value for money.'

title: 'Fragrance-free'
body: 'Highly impressed with the Biotique Basil and Parsley Bathing Bar! Its natural fragrance-free formula feels incredibly refreshing. Leaves my skin revitalized and clean. A must-try for anyone seeking a pure natural bathing experience. Five stars!'

title: 'Always good Product'
body: '- Everything is good in this Soap'

title: Don't like the smell
body: 'I bought it for the description of the smell alone but it smelt like typical hair oil.'

title: 'Smells like Nature'
body: 'This soap is a daily essential. It cleans effectively leaving a fresh scent. Its simplicity and affordability make it a staple in hygiene. A dependable product for everyday cleanliness and well-being.'

title: 'I prefer these big ones over transparent ones.'

title: 'Biotique Basil and Parsley Body Soap: Refreshing Revitalization'
body: 'The Biotique Basil and Parsley Revitalizing Body Soap (150g) is a refreshing soap that invigorates and nourishes the skin. With its natural ingredients and energizing scent this soap provides a revitalizing bathing experience leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.'
